attributes.action: Claudio Ranieri to be awarded an honorary Knighthood for services to football.
attributes.background:
Claudio Ranieri has put romance back into the beautiful game. Giving all supporters hope, that football isn't just about money.

He has conducted himself as a proper gentleman exercising decorum and decency at all times. A truly great role model for anyone in sport.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
